title: Three Fugitives (1989) Nick Nolte Martin Short James Earl Jones
description:
An American remake of the French film "LES FUGITIFS"

Lucas (Nick Nolte) has just been released from prison for robbing one too many banks and he has every intention of going straight. His buddy Dugan (James Earl Jones), who just happens to be a cop, offers to take Lucas to the nearest bank so he can start his new life with a brand-spanking new bank account. Naturally they joke about how funny it would be if Lucas went straight back to his old tricks. However the joke's on them when the bank is suddenly held-up by a desperate dim-wit called Ned (Martin Short). To make matters worse, Ned chooses to take Lucas as his hostage, leaving Dugan, and indeed the entire police force, to ponder whether or not Lucas and Ned have actually planned this robbery together. Surely Lucas wouldn't be that stupid... would he?
